original_text: And they shall keep his charge, and the charge of the whole congregation before the tabernacle of the congregation, to do the service of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 그들이 회막 앞에서 아론의 직무와 온 회중의 직무를 위하여 회막에서 시무하되

sentences.original_text: And they shall keep his charge
and the charge of the whole congregation
before the tabernacle of the congregation
to do the service of the tabernacle
